example.name: all args
example.text: The oil company claims that Alaskan officials prevented Exxon from [*-1] spraying dispersant onto the almost 11 million gallons of oil dumped when one of its tankers ran into an underwater reef.
example.arg: the almost 11 million gallons of oil dumped when one of its tankers ran into an underwater reef
